long_description: An integrated chain carrier, the Kryptonite Transit Tube-R Chain Carrier transports the Kryptonite Keeper 785 Integrated Chain Lock, sold separately. The Kryptonite Transit Tube-R Chain Carrier features 2 attachment methods: braze-on bolt points or 2 rip-and-stick straps. Also works with the Kryptonite Evolution series 4 1055 and the Kryptolok Series 2 955, not included.
short_description: An integrated chain carrier, the Kryptonite Transit Tube-R Chain Carrier transports the Kryptonite Keeper 785 Integrated Chain Lock, sold separately.
